price: 109. Bino nde ba oyo bato bozali kosuana mpona bango mpona bomoyi ya nsé; kasi nani akosuanisa na Allah mpona bango na mokolo ya suka? To nani akozala mobateli na bango?.
arabic: هَٰٓأَنتُمۡ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ جَٰدَلۡتُمۡ عَنۡهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا فَمَن يُجَٰدِلُ ٱللَّهَ عَنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ أَم مَّن يَكُونُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: hāantum hāulāi jādaltum ʿanhum fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā faman yujādilu al-laha ʿanhum yawma al-qiyāmati am man yakūnu ʿalayhim wakīlan
